messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1227
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/1/2004 9:15:39 AM Eastern Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: I am looking for suggestions of online games that are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/1/2004 9:15:39 AM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
I am looking for suggestions of online games that are appropriate and fun
for a non-reading 4 year-old. She is tired of the "learning" games (i.e.
"how-to-read," dot-to-dot, matching). She is interested in the solar
system, dinosaurs, fairies, pirates and the weather in particular. Any
suggestions are welcome!
BBC has a website with dinosaur games your daughter might enjoy. It is from
their show Walking with Dinosaurs. My son Sam (4) really liked it! - Sandy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
